titles.en: Chapter 6 – The attempt regarding seeking of the livelihood
Chapter 6 – The attempt regarding seeking of the livelihood

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ عَنْ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ بْنِ حَمَّادٍ عَنْ زِيَادٍ الْقَنْدِيِّ عَنِ الْحُسَيْنِ الصَّحَّافِ عَنْ سَدِيرٍ قَالَ قُلْتُ لِأَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) أَيُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ عَلَى الرَّجُلِ فِي طَلَبِ الرِّزْقِ فَقَالَ إِذَا فَتَحْتَ بَابَكَ وَ بَسَطْتَ بِسَاطَكَ فَقَدْ قَضَيْتَ مَا عَلَيْكَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Khalid, from Abdul Rahman Bin Hammad, from Ziyad Al Qindy, from Al Husayn Al Sahhaf, from Sadeyr who said, 
‘I said to Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup>, ‘Which thing is upon the man regarding seeking of the livelihood?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘If you open your door (of shop) and spread out (neatly) your merchandise, so you have fulfilled what is upon you’.

verses.text:
مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ عَمَّنْ ذَكَرَهُ عَنِ الطَّيَّارِ قَالَ قَالَ لِي أَبُو جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) أَيَّ شَيْ‏ءٍ تُعَالِجُ أَيَّ شَيْ‏ءٍ تَصْنَعُ فَقُلْتُ مَا أَنَا فِي شَيْ‏ءٍ قَالَ فَخُذْ بَيْتاً وَ اكْنُسْ فِنَاهُ وَ رُشَّهُ وَ ابْسُطْ فِيهِ بِسَاطاً فَإِذَا فَعَلْتَ ذَلِكَ فَقَدْ قَضَيْتَ مَا وَجَبَ عَلَيْكَ
قَالَ فَقَدِمْتُ فَفَعَلْتُ فَرُزِقْتُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Fazaal, from the one who mentioned it, from Al Tayyar who said, 
‘Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Which thing do you deal in, which thing do you make?’ So I said, ‘I am not involved in anything’. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Take a house (shop), and sweep its yard and sprinkle water over it, and spread out your merchandise therein. So when you do that, you would have fulfilled what is Obligated upon you’. 
He (the narrator) said, ‘I went ahead and did it, so I (achieved) livelihood’.
